General.Name: H&R Century Union Corp
General.Description: H&R Century Union Corporation engages in the drama series production and artist brokerage business in China. The company invests in, produces, and distributes film and television dramas. It also offers asset investment management services. The company was formerly known as Stellar Megaunion Corp. and changed its name to H&R Century Union Corporation in February 2017. H&R Century Union Corporation was founded in 1997 and is based in Chongqing, China.
